description: Stores student names, degrees, and image uploads. Focused on learning file/photo upload with Java and JSP. Goal: Learn how to upload and store student profile photos with DB integration.

description: User book reservation and return, admin updates book status, styled dashboard, navigation, and error pages. Goal: Build a full CRUD-based system and deploy it on GitHub & LinkedIn.

title: Train Ticket Booking System
description: Train schedule selection, seat reservation and booking history. Goal: Build a simulation of real-world ticket booking with form inputs and database connection.

title: Scooby-Doo Themed Game App (Figma UI Design)
